summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4853 for the improvement District No. 4853 for the improvement of Fauntleroy Avenue, from 35th Avenue Southwest to West Andover Street on the east; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55830, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
